participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and sociable, Emily enjoys connecting with others and values her relationships.
participant_1.background: I am in good shape and my weight is healthy. I enjoy trying new foods, but my favorite dishes are usually simple and comforting. I love all my pets equally, but my dog is especially special to me because she's my best friend. I have been married 3 times. I especially enjoy listening to the band the mutineers.

participant_2.name: Lucas
participant_2.personality: Creative and resilient, Lucas uses music as an outlet for his emotions and thrives despite challenges.
participant_2.background: My prized possession is my guitar, because it allows me to express my creativity and share my music with the world. I've had to deal with a lot of loss in my life, but I'm still here. My family is my everything. I have bowled a 300 game twice in my life. I balance my busy schedule by taking classes in the morning, working in the afternoon, and skiing in the evening.

content.text: Hi! I'm interested in finding a new hobby. What are you passionate about?
I'm passionate about music, especially guitar. I have bowled a 300 game twice in my life!
That's awesome! I wish I could bowl well. I have a dog that's my best friend. She's a rescue.
My family is my everything. I've had to deal with a lot of loss in my life, but I'm still here.
I'm sorry to hear that you've had to deal with loss. I'm glad to hear that you're still here. I've been married three times.
That's a lot! I'm curious to know what your favorite food is.
I enjoy trying new foods, but my favorite dishes are usually simple and comforting.
That sounds good! I like to cook and bake. I'm always looking for new recipes.
I love to cook too! What's your favorite thing to bake?
I love to bake cakes and cookies. I'm not very good at making pies.
I'm not very good at baking either. I like to make easy recipes.
Me too! I like to make recipes that are quick and easy.
